name: Duck Hunting Diagram Builder-Duck Hunting Spreads
name_original: Duck Hunting Diagram Builder-Duck Hunting Spreads
description:
Do you duck hunt and want to build your own decoy spreads? The Duck Hunting Diagram Builder app allows you to build, create and experiment with duck hunting spreads on your phone.

Place your hunting blind and decoys in any position you want and then place the decoys on the image in any layout you want. Use the most common hunting templates included such as field, pond, open water and shoreline setups. Plan your decoy strategy in advance of your hunt or recreate your best performing diagrams to replicate on your next hunt.

FEATURES:
- Plan your decoy spread strategy with your buddies in advance of your hunting trip
- 4 duck hunting scenarios: field, pond, open water and shoreline
- Feeding Decoy, Standing and Floating duck decoy images available
- Save diagrams you create to your camera roll to try on your next hunt
- Layout Blind and Boat blind hunter images available
- Recreate your most effective decoy spreads to remember what worked

Download the Duck Hunting Diagram Builder App and start building your own duck hunting diagrams today!
